pageDesc: Asymetrical range featuring aesthetic and directional grips.

paragraphs.title: A spoon of asymetry
paragraphs.desc: The asymetrical rounded edge of the spoons make them a little bit trickier and demanding for the climbers; while giving the setter more possibilites to create technical problems.

paragraphs.title: Compact, design, maximum usability
paragraphs.desc: The Spoons design also make those macro-volumes relatively compact, perfect to minimize occupied space while providing aesthetics and adding dimension to the wall.

paragraphs.name: name23
paragraphs.desc: The spoons are all designed in a way that makes it easier to create directional problems, their elongated shape and open grip helps to provide the setter with better control over the possible movements.

paragraphs.title: Dual texture for the finish
paragraphs.desc: The Spoons are by default coming with dual texture, for a smooth looking finish, and to ensure the setter reatisn control of how the macro is used by climbers.
